values:
okay i am back from japan. it was nice, fun and great and less expensive than i expected it to be.  and i wanna go back already XD

but i am still to tired and lazy to type whole stories about it here so please forgive me ^^;;; if there is anything you want to know about my trip or japan then you can ask me here anytime ^^

for now i go back to sleep....=_= bye!

sorry i am tired and travelled a lot this weekend and i am lazy so i am just gonna leave you with the notice that ''that thing'' that i was waiting for so long, finally had arrived last tuesday :D they should make the code for pictures also easier...i always keep forgetting it >_<

ahhh it has been very long since i updated here ^^; let's see.

i just finished my english conversation test here and i made it ^^ so that's one test down...next week testweeks will begin agai and i ain't feeling a bit happy about it >_<

good part is: i managed to finally find a way to memorize schoolthings like kanji in my head witheout forgetting it within 5 seconds. i can now manage to memorize it for several hours! w00t! i hope this method will give good results in the test week @_@

recently i also started to dream ALOT! seriously i haven;t dreamth so much in years as i have these past days. mostly they were about dollfies, kate bush and other vague stoff....but especially dollfies @_@

must be because i have a new obsession or something... ( NO it's not some idiotic guy it's a new HOBBY) ^^

i also managed to save quite some money i must say. the only thing were i have spended money on so far was some sushi from albert hein and i still need to pay for an order...but it isn't in yet so...i even stopped buying money from the school cantine and the train station so i am quite proud of myself hehehe. plus i don't feel ashamed for even picking up money off the floor when i see it. it's MONEY people, not BUBBLEGUM that i would scrape of the floor and put in my mouth =_= ( ewww...)

also got quite a lot of comissions this month and already managed to make drawings for people this month worth at least 200$ in total ^_^ so i can't complain :D i lost my cleaning job for 4 months because my contract ended. over 4 months i can contact them again to work for them again.

damn health assurance...sucking up 112 euro worth of my little bit of money =_=.....

yeah it's been a while since i wrothe here i honestly do not have much interesting stuff to tell except that in the christmas vacation, me and long went to visit a friend of us in the far north near emmen :) it was fun to meet the person in real life again snice we usuallly only have contact trough msn.

we also went to the zoo wich was nice too but it looked like all animals were into yaoi XD

i also spend most of my christmas vacation playing resident evil 4 ( hoho leon is sooo cool XD) i think that game is my favourite of the resident evil series ^^ it was really well made, and it felt like playing a movie :)i can't wait to play resident evil 5 ^^

ehm...that's it...actually...i've been stressing about a lot of things again lately but...i won't turn this into an stupid emo post now :P i hope i can watch gungrave soon....30 more download hours to go....T_T

i am being emo all day since....last week....yesterday i was emo too....and today too...UNTIL! i received a package... and opened it and YES! a while ago i made a drawing for the cover of a trance music label called sential recordings and they sended me the cd and an LP cover with my drawing on it!! YOHOOOOOOO!! my emo-ess withered all away YES YES YES! XD here are the pictures i took of it ^^ sorry the piucs are a bit blurry ^^; and this is their website: http://www.sential.co.uk/ *dances* oooh the joy !! XD

just wanted to say that i enjoyed loraine's party last yesterday ^^ ( and yes i finally manage to writhe your name good! ) but before i start about the party, i will first talk a bit about what happened before it:

when arriving in leiden, we first decided to go shopping XD since i knew that leiden has about 3 great clothing shops that i like we finally got the chance to check all 3 of them :D

clothingshop #1: from the outside it had great shoes and gothicy clothing in the window so before i knew it i  dragged myself into it all happy happy and the rest followed me in of course....but something didn't feel right...after a while i noticed that a lot of clothing had the brand ''londsdale'' on them and i heard the lady behind the counter saying something to a customer about the dutch fighting so hard in the war for freedom and people like them ( me and long?) taking advantage of it witheout ever having done something for it? i dunno, she didn't exacly say it like that but that's what it meanth for sure. so slowly i told everyone that it was better for us to leave ^^: quite interesting though....and i can laugh about the fact that i just happily walked into an racist shop witheout me noticing it XD making the owners of it all nervous and what not lol...

shop #2: after that we got to the more friendly shops and shop nr 2 was a punky shop ^^ i managed to buy this cool shirt there and the owner of it asked me if he could take a picture of me with it ( oooh my first modelling job XD) when i putted it on he said that the battery of his camera was almost gone but he managed to make just one picture. he wasn't able to show it to me though....but he would put it on the website of the shop XD wheeee!

shop #3: was a gothic /metal shop but this time the owners seemed more friendly, since they friendly greeted me when i walked around and hardly payed attention to us. i felt more comfortable ^^i didn't find anything good though but they did had some interesting clothing...but maybe a little too gothicy for me yet ^^;

anyway! after that we went to loraine's party ^^ it was nice to see everyone back again ( although i didn't really see much of bert and sabine ;_;) it was also interesting to meet roel....although when he talked to me eventualy about a certain person he kept teasing me about it that evening occasionally T_T i hope he won't tell bad things about me to him. i also found out that my little present for loraine was quite populairsince patrick, long and rolf kept playing with it all the time XD

anyways...i would have liked to stay longer but most people had to go back and i did not wanted to go back the next day on my own T_T sigh...anyways...that's about it...got nothing much else to say...

have a nice day! :3

i recently started to watch the new anime series called paradise kiss. i noticed that the last anime series i have watched all had something to do with cultural stufff. ''beck'' was about music ''honey and clover'' about art and paradise kiss about fashion. i only watched one episode so far but it has already sucked me in :P i even have a favourite character XD the thing that surprised me the most of this anime was the ending song, wich wasn't a japanese song from some japanese band but one of the latest songs from franz ferdinant. uhu pretty cool :D

apart from that, my hair is straight again yoehoe!! and it is staying straight better than the first time. i love it hahaha XD  you can't imagine how much i enjoy the wind blowing my hair in my face and waking up and having my hair immedeately the way i want it to be hahaha XD

a shame the good snow went away so fast. i had such a long schoolday >< grrr and my presentation was really * puke* but i was surprised when lieuwe suddenly started to talk to me on msn saying that my presentation wasn't so bad at all 0_0;;

the crush thing...i could say i have made a little bit of progress as the ape has given me a few compliments and starts to talk to me on msn out of his own now ( thank god! ><) he keeps saying he is shy ( what he? shy? MY ASS! ) but i'll try a little longer...

my sleepover at this girl's place whom i know from msn was pretty fun ^^ i got a different view of cats now as her cat was a real sweetie ^^ the cat kept biting me like a snack  but i survived hahaha XD thank god it used it's fangs instead of it's nails. i am scared of cat nails >< and since i am used to dogs i didn't mind the cat biting me all the time :P we ate sushi and played videogames and watched charlie and the chocolate factory ^^ there was this one really cool game that she had. she had a device hooked on her playstation 2 with gloves attached on it. when you putted the gloves on your hand you had to move your arms and fight yourself against enemies hahaha really fun but also very tiring @_@

now i will go and eat me some bulgarian food. so...see ya later!

this will be justa  random post. i notice that all i have been writhing lately are tests and surveys, and after having seen episode 8 of densha otoko i feel like typing...

yesterday i went to a comicfestival again. i had better days selling my stuff. but at least i got all of my costs out so i guess that is good. i am glad that my new manga is finished so now i can rest a bit again and put more energy in my school for the testweek. however no matter how hard i try i keep thinking up new stories and idea to draw every minute. it's like a disease. once i infished somethig i want to start all over again. i am not sure if this is good or bad...i guess that's just the way i am. anyway at the festival i bought a few small things and i got quite a number of things for free wich is always fun. while spyoing on a certain doujinshi group's stand suddenly someone grabbed my shoulders from behind:

strange man: hey there! you want to participate in our small comic quiz?
me: well actually i ehm...
strange man: OKAY WE HAVE A KANDIDATE!
me: 0_0;

the prizes were not great at all ^^; suske and wiske the movie dvd? pokemon and luney tunes comics? come on! ^^; so yeah i let a little boy win. i also received a dvd from a friend of mine who visited the festival ^^ i was happy to see him again :) and the dvd was quite nice ^^ in japan a few years ago, there was this trend about cyberidols. what are those? well idols ( no not the tv programme!) are usually cute girls who sing songs and are populair like britney spears. except in this case they were 3d computer girls. so yeah they created computergirls and let them sing songs and become populair instead of real girls. this dvd was about such a girl and contained a videoclip and 6 short movies and some extra's of her. while it isn't as great as the final fantasy advent children quality, it was certainly fun to watch :)

densha otoko is so much fun ^^ i almost cried again with episode 8. it looks all so recognizable to me. it's also funny ^^ ( otherwise i would not have watched it) that series really makes me laugh ^^ ( no it's not an anime but a japanese life action series. though it does contain a lot about the anime/mannga fanculture in it) however in this episode nr. 8 there was also a bit of a dissapointment in it. while everything was great and funny as always...it was revealed that my favourite character has/had a girlfriend...T_T sigh...now i won't be drooling over him the same way like i did before...sigh...:( i do hope that i can meet someone like him in real life someday. it should be able to happen...half long hair, no make up and normal clothes...nothing extreme...but i guess not. 

*slaps herself* okay i won't go further into emo mode ^^; ik denk dat ik weer de nichtrijder ga kijken....zo een dome nederlandse nagesychroniseerd filmpje van de nightrider...als je de serie niet kent zul je dit filmpje ook niet leuk vinden ^^;

that's all :) bye!

In a Past Life...
You Were: A Diseased Belly Dancer. Where You Lived: France. How You Died: Killed in Battle.
Who Were You In a Past Life?
great....=_=;
You Are 22 Years Old
Under 12: You are a kid at heart. You still have an optimistic life view - and you look at the world with awe. 13-19: You are a teenager at heart. You question authority and are still trying to find your place in this world. 20-29: You are a twentysomething at heart. You feel excited about what's to come... love, work, and new experiences. 30-39: You are a thirtysomething at heart. You've had a taste of success and true love, but you want more! 40+: You are a mature adult. You've been through most of the ups and downs of life already. Now you get to sit back and relax.
What Age Do You Act?
yippie ^^
How You Life Your Life
You seem to be straight forward, but you keep a lot inside. You say whatever is on your mind. Other people's reactions don't phase you. You prefer a variety of friends and tend to change friends quickly. You tend to dream big, but you worry that your dreams aren't attainable.
How Do You Live Your Life?
yup...most of that is true...
You Are a Kogyaru!
If it's cute, you'll wear it. Fake and bake, hair bleach, and bright makeup line your bathroom cabinet. As for clothes - anything that's short and cute ("kawaii!"). You are the prize object of all sorts of men - but you are really looking for a rich foreign guy. He'll find you out hanging out in Shibuya shopping at the 109, text messaging and sending photos over your cellphone.
What's Your Japanese Subculture?
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!;_;
Your Pimp Name Is...
Sexxie Dynamite
What's Your Pimp Name?
hehehe XD
How You Are In Love
You take a while to fall in love with someone. Trust takes time. You give and take equally in relationships. You tend to get very attached when you're with someone. You want to see your love all the time. You love your partner unconditionally and don't try to make them change. You stay in love for a long time, even if you aren't loved back. When you fall, you fall hard.
How Are You In Love?
true, but i'm not sure about the ''not changing your partner'' thing
You Are 60% Weird
You're so weird, you think you're *totally* normal. Right? But you wig out even the biggest of circus freaks!
How Weird Are You?
as if ya all didn't know already :P
Your Daddy Is Darth Vader
What You Call Him: Papi Why You Love Him: He takes you to Disneyland
Who's Your Daddy?
what the hell??? 0_0;

not much is happening in my life. so what should i talk about?
........................................................................FINAL FANTASY ADVENT CHILDREN !! of course.

i saw it i saw it yes yes !! XD ( i already have seen it since monday...thanks long :D) thanks god it was better than i expected and i enjoyed it very much XD i already lost count of how often i have seen the movie XD was the movie perfect? no it wasn't. there were a few things that bothered me like:
-many main characters had too small roles ><
-the movie felt too short
- certain things in the story stayed unclear
-some people who seemed to be totally dead in the game were mysteriously alive in the movie
-people could fly and jump around so high without breaking anything ^^;
-camera movement go TOO fast in the battle scenes ><
-sometimes the animation was not fluent
-cid was not swearing and smoking a cigarette ><

apart from all this i LOVE the movie ^^ i even sometimes pink a little tear away when i see the ending ^^:

i also started to follow the series called witch on jetix. i kinda like it but i can hardly follow it because THOSE BASTARDS ALREADY STARTED DOING RECAPS >< even though the only aired about 4/5 episodes now they already started to recap >< urg! but yeah it's an nice series to watch.

ehm...that's actually all....^^: this tuesday my brother needs to go to hospital and then will be operated at his stomach in wednes day so i hope it will go well. i don't exacly know what is wrong with his stomach but...ah well...

that's all. mata kondo!

yesterday i went to amsterdam to see howl's moving castle ^^ it was nice. the movie was also very nice and omg, howl is the most sexiest miyazaki character ever XD bwahahahaha......ahem...anyway like i said it was a nice movie except that the ending was so....sudden? unlike spirited away and princess mononoke were the endings were worked out quite well, this movie...well...anyway in the end i also ended up buying a new manga named xxxholic from CLAMP ( chobits, card captor sakura) at the beginning of this manga there was a lot of talking and stuff and i was like: omg no this is one of those so typical manga's >_< but thank god later in the manga the story became more interesting...i am not too sure if i would buy the other books as well....hmm

at the very end i was sooooo sick...my legs hurt and my head hurted so much and my stomach hurted wich resulted in me feeling sick...=_= but i am okay now.

i recently downloaded more music ( as always :D) and ended up with two latest songs from gackt.......the first song: ''Todokanai Ai to Shitteita no ni Osae Kirezu ni Aishitsuzuketa'' (probably the longest song title ever >_<)........sucks....it really does...it's a dramatic gackt song and his voice soo fucks up in this song ...>_< am i the only one who has noticed that gackt's voice has changed?  it's not as strong and clear as it used to be >_< and in the videoclip that belongs with this song he looks like that harry potter teacher called snape or something? he really looks like him >_< maybe he will become a ''snape'' stand in in harry potter 3254325 :P  anyway his other song with a more decent title called, noesis was better. it has more rock in it like his songs used to be. the song is cool....weren't it that 60% of the time, gackt computerizes his voice in this song wich totally sucks as well....if he hadn't done that then it would be one of the good old gackt songs...=_= why do artists always end up screwing things up? hmm? it isn't just gackt who ends up like this but i have seen this so often. why? 

ehm...tomorrow i will go to another comic fest and am now preparing for it....nja...euhm...that is actually all ^^;  bye!

I recently went to the stripfestijn in Dordrecht ( Netherlands) This comic fest is being held once every two year. I was invited to come and sit at the stand of Stripster. Since this festival was being held outside I had trouble deciding wether I should come or not since the weather was so bad  But at the end I decided to come anyway 
I didn't think very much of it and didn't make so much preparations for this con as I usually do for other conventions. I had a little trouble finding the festival when I arrived in Dordrecht but when I arrived I saw fellow manga artist and old classmate ''Tze ting Chao'' sitting at the table where I was allowed to sign and draw  Later on I also met another Dutch manga artist like us, ''Marissa Delbressine''. And also a good old friend of mine who brought codes for me for my webshop to make a good webshop system ( Thank you so much ;_;) It was nice seeing known faces at that place and it had quite a nice athmosphere eventhough the weather still wasn't very good   A band was playing so there was some background music as well and eventhough it was held outside and there was bad weather, there were quite a lot of visitors 
I didn't really buy anything and I didn't expect to sell much. At first I indeed did not sell much   But later on I sold quite a lot of original drawings so in the end I managed to make enough money to cover the costs made for this trip and a new inktcardridge. Plus I also made profit  Now I managed to earn enough money to let my newest book get printed at a reall professional printershop 
What kind of manga that will be?
Well you just wait and see  

 and for now i will leave you with TWO clips from my favourite band XD KAGRRA, !!!! XD

http://s29.yousendit.com/d.aspx?id=2A77XF8RF6UNG2K9RR1QGNAU48

zo ging dat zowat de hele tijd ^^;  die vent had volgens mij haast ofzo. hij vroeg me dingen over onze opleiding..zoals: wat vind je van de roosters. en dan moest ik een rapport punten geven op iedere onderdeel. ik heb zowat overal een 7 gegeven omdat ik niet verstond wat ie zei ^^;  volgens mij dacht ie dat ik doof was ofzo omdat ik de hele tijd ''watte??'' zei -_-;; nja

da's alles...ik heb nog steeds helemaal niks aan slb gedaan. ik ben zo een luie donder.=_=...

ik had gisteren nog een kadootje gekocht voor mijn penvriendin in japan die vandaag jarig was ^^: ik had haar een sleutelhanger met klompjes en ik wilde ook nog iets met nijntje kopen. ik helemaal naar een winkel gezocht in maastricht die nijntje spullen verkocht, liep ik uiteindelijk maar de expo binnen en heb me daar zo een nijntje ding gekocht waar je een foto'tje in kunt stoppen. ik weet verder niet wat je anders aan een japans iemand moet geven die 23 jaar word en nooit zegt wat ze leuk vind ^^;  ik liep de winkel uit, draaide een hoek om en ja hoor....ik stond daar recht tegen over de nijntje winkel die vol stond met nijntje spullen...=_= ach ja...

er komen in april japanse films op mtv: MTV-NL gaat op Japanse tour Vanaf vrijdag 8 april komt er wekelijks een japanse film om 22.00 uur. de aftrap komt met JU ON: The Grudge) 15 april JU ON 2 22 april DEADLY OUTLAW,REKKA 29 april BATTLE ROYALE II: Requim waarschijnlijk zenden ze ook een paar koreaanse films uit. ook is het me gelukt om japanse music clips te uploaden dus ik zet iedere keer hier wat screencaps ( als ik die kan vinden >_<) van die clips en dan mogen jullie iedere keer kiezen welke jullie willen zien. de clip met de meeste stemmen geld :P #1: Psycho le cemu - roman hikou info: SUPER GENKI!! kei blije clip man XD wel een aardig liedje en die mannen hahaha XD ( ja het zijn ALLEMAAL mannen) het is een erg vrolijke videoclip die me iedere keer wel vrolijk maakt als ik hem zie XD een super happy pop liedje XD sorry dat de plaatjes er niet geweldig uitzien >_< maar ik kan zelf geen screencaps maken en ze waren erg moeilijk te vinden, #2: miyavi - pop is dead weer een redelijk vrolijke clip XD erg flashy...ik vind het liedje wel leuk maar ik kan me indenken dat de meesten van jullie zijn muziek kut zullen vinden....dat had ik namelijk eerst ook bij hem ^^; nu ben ik eraan gewend. happy rock muziek :P en sorry dat de plaatjes zo klein zijn >_< en sorry als die plaatjes niet allemaal echt werken >_<

weer een periode voorbij, wat gaat het toch hard, het is net alsof, hoe ouder je word hoe sneller de tijd voorbij gaat >_< 

ik ben ECHT blij dat mijn presentatie voorbij was =_= volgens mij was ik echt een idioot en waarom moest ik nou zonodig l...a..ng....zaa.....m praten >_<;; en dan die R van mij >_< eewww..daar ga ik echt wat aan doen!

verder heb net een kleine tekening wedstrijdje gewonnen XD ( yaoi tekening mwahahah) ik teken dat soort spul nauwelijks misschien dat ik dat later wel doe? weet nog niet. de prijs was dat mijn tekening werd geplaatst in het eerste boekje van een nieuwe doujinshi ( amateurtekenaars) groepje. en het krijgt een ere plaatsje op hun site :P

verder komt een andere tekening ook nog als pinup art in een mexicaanse comic XD hoe ik daaraan kom? nja via iemand op mijn msn die in mexico als inkleurder voor comics werkt hehehe :D ik krijg als het goed is een paar exemplaren thuisgestuurd als dank :) ze zullen wel in het spaans zijn >_<;;

hmm verder..verder....ah ja..ik ben nu over de helft met mijn grote manga >_< ik zit nu op pagina 37..ik heb er dus nog zowat 23 pagina's te gaan en nog maar ongeveer twee weken...=_=;; ik hoop dat het goed komt.

een vrouwtje wilde op haar website ook een kleine tekening van mij plaatsen, wilde ze me 50 euro voor geven >_< ik schaam me dan echt dood als mensen me een groot bedrag willen geven voor een klein flutdingetje >_<;; ik weet ook nooit wat voor prijzen ik moet vragen. ik zei dat 30 wel genoeg was...ook omdat ze misschien later meer tekeningen van me wilde kopen XD

volgens mij is er echt iets mis met mijn haar >_< ik was het vandaag aan het wassen en besefte dat..aangezien ik ze in meer dan 15 jaar nog NOOIT had afgeknipt..ze nog nooit langer zijn geggroeid dan net bij mijn middel ( als ze helemaal recht zouden zijn en nat.)...volgens mij klopt dat niet. mijn haar groeit echt niet. ik denk dat als jullie je haar in 15 jaar niet zouden laten afknippen, dat het aan de grond zou komen toch? ik weet niet goed wat ik er daarmee aanmoet ik wil langer haar >_<!!
